  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>1825</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Hjernen</string>
            <string language="en">The brain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Gehirn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le cerveau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O cérebro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il cervello</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο εγκέφαλος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cerebro</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Hjernen har ulike sentere for ulike funksjoner. Her kan du se hvike sentere som brukes til hva.</string>
            <string language="en">The brain has different centers for the various functions.What are the different centers used for?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">hjernen</string>
            <string language="en">the brain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">talesenter</string>
            <string language="en">the speech center</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Gehirn hat unterschiedliche Mitten für das 
verschiedene functions.What sind die unterschiedlichen Mitten, die 
für benutzt werden?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le cerveau a différents centres pour le divers 
functions.What sont les différents centres utilisés pour ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O cérebro tem centros diferentes para o vário 
functions.What é os centros diferentes usados para?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il cervello ha centri differenti per il vario 
functions.What è i centri differenti usati per?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο εγκέφαλος έχει τα διαφορετικά κέντρα για τις 
διάφορες λειτουργίες Τι τα διαφορετικά κέντρα 
χρησιμοποιούνται για;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿El cerebro tiene diversos centros para el vario 
functions.What es los diversos centros usados para?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">das Gehirn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Redemitte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le cerveau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le centre de la parole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o cérebro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o centro do discurso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il cervello</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il centro di discorso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ο εγκέφαλος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">το λεκτικό κέντρο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el cerebro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el centro del discurso</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
